mapper.select: SELECT er.id, er.insert_date AS insertDate, er.status, er.eq_name AS eqName, er.eq_manufacturer AS eqManufacturer, er.eq_processor AS eqProcessor, er.eq_memory AS eqMemory, er.eq_justification AS eqJustification FROM eq_request er WHERE er.status NOT IN ('DELETED') ORDER BY er.insert_date DESC
